verses.text: \add Make haste\add*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me; make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* to \w help|strong="H5833"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 70.1 \ft to helpâ€¦: Heb. to my help\f*

Let them be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* and \w confounded|strong="H2659"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* after my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: let them be \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, and put to \w confusion|strong="H3637"\w*, that \w desire|strong="H2655"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.
Let them be turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* for a \w reward|strong="H6118"\w* of their \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* that \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Aha|strong="H1889"\w*, \w aha|strong="H1889"\w*.

Let all those that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thee \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in thee: and let such as \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, Let \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w*.

But I \add am\add* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*: make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* unto me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thou \add art\add* my \w help|strong="H5828"\w* and my \w deliverer|strong="H6403"\w*; O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, make no \w tarrying|strong="H0309"\w*.
